statements: SELECT * FROM battery_maintenance_alerts;
SELECT id, battery_id, alert_message FROM battery_maintenance_alerts WHERE battery_id = 1;
SELECT battery_id, alert_message FROM battery_maintenance_alerts WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM battery_maintenance_alerts WHERE alert_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT id, battery_id, alert_message FROM battery_maintenance_alerts ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM battery_maintenance_alerts WHERE battery_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT alert_id, message, timestamp FROM battery_maintenance_alerts WHERE battery_id = 456 AND severity = 'High' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT DISTINCT battery_id FROM battery_maintenance_alerts WHERE severity IN ('High', 'Medium')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM battery_maintenance_alerts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(severity) AS avg_severity FROM battery_maintenance_alerts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM battery_alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_description, alert_type FROM battery_alerts;
SELECT battery_id, battery_name, battery_level FROM battery_status WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM battery_status ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT battery_id, battery_name FROM battery_status WHERE battery_level < 20;
SELECT * FROM battery_alerts;
SELECT battery_id, alert_type FROM battery_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'low_battery';
SELECT battery_name, battery_level FROM battery_status ORDER BY battery_level DESC;
SELECT alert_description FROM battery_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'critical' AND battery_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM battery_status WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BatteryStatus WHERE maintenance_required = TRUE;
SELECT battery_id, battery_percentage FROM BatteryStatus WHERE battery_percentage > 50;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_id DESC;
SELECT battery_id, COUNT(*) as num_alerts FROM Alerts GROUP BY battery_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM BatteryStatus WHERE battery_percentage > 50 ORDER BY battery_percentage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT battery_id, battery_percentage FROM BatteryStatus WHERE maintenance_required = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT battery_id, AVG(battery_percentage) AS avg_percentage FROM BatteryStatus GROUP BY battery_id HAVING AVG(battery_percentage) > 70;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'critical' ORDER BY alert_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM battery_information;
SELECT battery_id, battery_status FROM battery_information WHERE battery_voltage > 3.5;
SELECT technician_name, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'repair';
SELECT DISTINCT battery_id FROM alerts WHERE alert_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT battery_id, history_date, history_event FROM battery_history ORDER BY history_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM battery_information;
SELECT battery_status, battery_voltage FROM battery_information WHERE battery_voltage > 50;
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT battery_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT battery_id, history_date, history_event FROM battery_history WHERE history_event LIKE '%replacement%';
SELECT * FROM BatteryStatus;
SELECT battery_id, battery_level FROM BatteryStatus ORDER BY battery_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM BatteryMaintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine';
SELECT user_id, email_notifications, sms_notifications FROM UserPreferences WHERE email_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM AlertLog LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM BatteryStatus
SELECT battery_id, battery_level FROM BatteryStatus ORDER BY last_checked DESC
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM BatteryMaintenance WHERE maintenance_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT user_id, email_notifications, sms_notifications FROM UserPreferences WHERE email_notifications = TRUE
SELECT user_id, alert_threshold FROM AlertSubscription WHERE alert_threshold > 0.5
